conectores_logicos.explicacion: Temporal connector that introduces an action or situation occurring at a specific time.
conectores_logicos.ejemplo: "When autumn turned cold, Mama Bear prepared the den."

conectores_logicos.explicacion: Contrast or opposition connector that introduces an idea that contradicts or limits what was previously said.
conectores_logicos.ejemplo: "But, Mama! If I sleep, I'll miss the last snowflakes!"

conectores_logicos.explicacion: Temporal connector indicating that two actions occur at the same time.
conectores_logicos.ejemplo: "While you sleep, your body will grow strong."

conectores_logicos.explicacion: Temporal connector indicating later time or sequence of actions.
conectores_logicos.ejemplo: "Brum kept walking. Then he met a little Rabbit."

conectores_logicos.explicacion: Connector marking the last step or conclusion of a sequence of events.
conectores_logicos.ejemplo: "Finally, one morning he felt a tickle."

conectores_logicos.explicacion: Conclusive connector that summarizes or presents the consequence of what was narrated.
conectores_logicos.ejemplo: "And so, Brum the bear cub became the champion of naps."

verbos_y_adjetivos.explicacion: Verb meaning to travel through a place to discover or get to know it.
Adjective describing something full of energy, color, or life.
Adjective describing a state of extreme tiredness.
Verb meaning to get into a comfortable, curled-up position, usually to sleep or rest.
verbos_y_adjetivos.ejemplo: "He snuggled up next to Mama Bear."

verbos_y_adjetivos.explicacion: Adjective describing something extraordinarily good or that causes admiration.

sustantivos_clave.explicacion: State of deep lethargy in which some animals spend the winter.
sustantivos_clave.ejemplo: "it's time for you to prepare for hibernation."

sustantivos_clave.explicacion: Capacity to perform work or activity; vitality.
Natural or artificial cavity in the ground, often used as a shelter.
sustantivos_clave.ejemplo: "Mama Bear prepared the den for the winter nap."

sustantivos_clave.explicacion: Season of the year following winter, characterized by the rebirth of nature.

expresiones_idiomaticas.explicacion: Expression describing a facial gesture of displeasure, doubt, or disapproval.
Expression indicating a light, repetitive sensation that provokes an involuntary reaction, like laughing or yawning.
expresiones_idiomaticas.ejemplo: "felt a big yawn that tickled his nose."

expresiones_idiomaticas.explicacion: Expression describing an unclear, slow, or thick voice, typical of tiredness or sleepiness.

funciones_comunicativas.explicacion: Function to state what one wants or, conversely, what one rejects.
funciones_comunicativas.ejemplo: "I don't want to hibernate!" / "He wanted to see the forest."

funciones_comunicativas.explicacion: Function to offer guidance, instructions, or clarify concepts.
funciones_comunicativas.ejemplo: "Hibernation isn't just sleeping. It's a magical wait." / "Rest is the food of energy."

funciones_comunicativas.explicacion: Function to express how the body or mind feels.
funciones_comunicativas.ejemplo: "His body felt heavy." / "He felt so strong and full of energy!"
